website.about: I'm Alan Joshua, a passionate web developer with 1 year of experience crafting user-friendly web experiences. I'm proficient in modern technologies like React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Flask, and I enjoy working with APIs to integrate powerful functionality. I believe in building responsive websites and 3D websites that are not only visually appealing but also intuitive and accessible. I'm always eager to learn new things and collaborate on challenging projects. Let's bring your web ideas to life!

project.heading: 3D Library website
project.subheading: A learning website for students with google books api integrated

project.heading: Lab portfolio
project.subheading: A sample dynamic website template for chemistry research laboratory

project.heading: Online Voting
project.subheading: A voting platform for inter-college election with Google authentication and supabase
